## ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chapter 20 â€” The Refusal

After doubt, grief, financial strain, and interrogation of ego, quitting would have been understandable. Instead, something quieter formedâ€”not defiance, not ambition, but refusal. This chapter explores how conviction hardens into identity, and how continuing became less about success and more about coherence.

tags: ðŸ”’ Building Continuum - Chapter 20 â€” The Refusal

After doubt, grief, financial strain, and interrogation of ego, quitting would have been understandable. Instead, something quieter formedâ€”not defiance, not ambition, but refusal. This chapter explores how conviction hardens into identity, and how continuing became less about success and more about coherence.
